zh-cn: 新浪集团控股有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家服务中国大陆及全球华人社群的中文网络内容服务提供商，与腾讯、搜狐和网易并称中国四大门户网站。由原四通利方公司和华渊资讯公司于1998年合并而成。
description.en: A Chinese online media company serving China and the global Chinese communities. It is known as one of the four major portal websites in China, along with Tencent, Sohu, and NetEase. It was formed from the merger of SRSNet (formerly Shidonglifang) and Sinanet (formerly Huayuan Information) in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，新浪网创始人之一，曾任新浪总裁兼CEO。他也是四通利方的创始人之一。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, a co-founder of Sina.com, and served as its President and CEO. He was also a co-founder of SRSNet.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，新浪网创始人之一，曾先后担任新浪总裁、CEO、副董事长及代理董事长等职务。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur, a co-founder of Sina.com, and has served in various roles including President, CEO, Vice Chairman, and Acting Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 台湾企业家，华渊资讯公司创始人，新浪网创始人之一，曾任新浪副董事长。
description.en: Taiwanese entrepreneur, founder of Sinanet, and a co-founder of Sina.com, where he served as Vice Chairman.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，现任新浪董事长兼CEO。他于2009年领导了新浪的管理层收购（MBO）。
description.en: Chinese business executive, currently the Chairman and CEO of Sina. He led Sina's management buyout (MBO) in 2009.

description.zh-cn: 新浪公司党委书记。
description.en: Party Secretary of Sina Corporation.

zh-cn: 四通利方信息技术有限公司

description.zh-cn: 一家位于北京中关村的中文软件公司，由四通集团公司、王志东和严援朝于1993年共同创办。后于1998年与华渊资讯合并成为新浪。
description.en: A Chinese software company based in Zhongguancun, Beijing, co-founded in 1993 by Stone Group, Wang Zhidong, and Yan Yuanchao. It later merged with Sinanet in 1998 to form Sina.

description.zh-cn: 由姜丰年创办的台湾公司，是新浪的前身之一，于1998年与四通利方合并。
description.en: A Taiwanese company founded by Jiang Fengnian, one of the predecessors of Sina, which merged with SRSNet in 1998.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型互联网公司，与新浪、搜狐和网易并称为中国四大门户网站。
description.en: A major Chinese internet company, known as one of the four major portal websites in China along with Sina, Sohu, and NetEase.

description.zh-cn: 中国互联网公司，与新浪、腾讯和网易并称为中国四大门户网站。
description.en: A Chinese internet company, known as one of the four major portal websites in China along with Sina, Tencent, and NetEase.

description.zh-cn: 中国互联网技术公司，与新浪、腾讯和搜狐并称为中国四大门户网站。
description.en: A Chinese internet technology company, known as one of the four major portal websites in China along with Sina, Tencent, and Sohu.

description.zh-cn: 美国的一家电子股票交易所。新浪于2000年至2021年在此上市。
description.en: An American electronic stock exchange. Sina was listed on it from 2000 to 2021.

description.zh-cn: 中国民营高科技企业，是四通利方的创办者之一。
description.en: A Chinese private high-tech enterprise and one of the founders of SRSNet.

description.zh-cn: 中国计算机科学家，CCDOS发明人，四通利方的创始人之一。
description.en: Chinese computer scientist, inventor of CCDOS, and a co-founder of SRSNet.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，曾在王志东离职后接任新浪CEO。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur who took over as CEO of Sina after Wang Zhidong's departure.

description.zh-cn: 中国网络游戏公司，曾在2005年意图收购新浪但未成功。
description.en: A Chinese online gaming company that attempted an unsuccessful takeover of Sina in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家，曾任新浪董事，于2008年退出董事会。
description.en: Chinese entrepreneur who served as a director on Sina's board until his departure in 2008.

description.zh-cn: 中国视频分享网站，新浪曾于2011年对其进行投资。
description.en: A Chinese video-sharing website in which Sina invested in 2011.

description.zh-cn: 新浪高管，曾任首席运营官兼联席总裁。
description.en: Sina executive who served as COO and Co-President.

description.zh-cn: 新浪高管，曾任首席技术官兼联席总裁。
description.en: Sina executive who served as CTO and Co-President.

description.zh-cn: 中国大型电子商务公司，于2013年入股新浪微博，并与新浪有战略合作关系。
description.en: A major Chinese e-commerce company that invested in Sina Weibo in 2013 and has a strategic partnership with Sina.

description.zh-cn: 由新浪于2018年推出的消费者投诉平台。
description.en: A consumer complaint platform launched by Sina in 2018.

description.zh-cn: 由新浪于2009年推出的微博客服务网站，是中国访问量最大的网站之一。
description.en: A microblogging service launched by Sina in 2009, one of the most visited websites in China.

description.zh-cn: 由新浪于2005年上线的网络日志频道，曾是中国主流的博客平台之一，于2022年4月关闭。
description.en: An online blog channel launched by Sina in 2005. It was one of the mainstream blog platforms in China and was shut down in April 2022.

description.zh-cn: 由微软公司推出的门户网站和相关互联网服务，曾于2010年与新浪签署合作协议。
description.en: A web portal and related collection of Internet services offered by Microsoft, which signed a cooperation agreement with Sina in 2010.

description.zh-cn: 美国职业篮球联赛，于2013年与新浪建立战略合作伙伴关系。
description.en: A professional basketball league in the United States that established a strategic partnership with Sina in 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中国电子商务公司，于2017年与新浪签署“京浪计划”战略合作。
description.en: A Chinese e-commerce company that signed the 'Jing-Lang Plan' strategic cooperation with Sina in 2017.

description.zh-cn: 浙江省的广播电视机构，于2017年与新浪签署战略合作协议。
description.en: The broadcasting and television organization of Zhejiang Province, which signed a strategic cooperation agreement with Sina in 2017.

nodes.id: 2018年中央广播电视总台春节联欢晚会

zh-cn: 2018年中央广播电视总台春节联欢晚会

description.zh-cn: 中央广播电视总台在2018年农历除夕举办的综合性文艺晚会，微博是其新媒体社交平台独家合作伙伴。
description.en: A comprehensive literary and art gala held by China Central Television on the Lunar New Year's Eve of 2018. Weibo was its exclusive new media social platform partner.

nodes.id: 全国“扫黄打非”工作小组办公室

zh-cn: 全国“扫黄打非”工作小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 中国负责打击淫秽色情和非法出版物的政府机构，曾在2014年因传播淫秽色情信息问题处罚新浪。
description.en: A Chinese government agency responsible for combating pornography and illegal publications, which penalized Sina in 2014 for disseminating obscene and pornographic content.

nodes.id: 国家互联网信息办公室

zh-cn: 国家互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 中国互联网内容监管机构，曾在2019年指导北京市网信办约谈新浪并责令其整改。
description.en: The internet content regulator in China, which guided the Beijing Cyberspace Administration to summon and order Sina to rectify its practices in 2019.

nodes.id: 北京市互联网信息办公室

zh-cn: 北京市互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 北京市的互联网内容监管机构，曾在2019年约谈新浪并责令其对旗下产品进行整改。
description.en: The internet content regulator in Beijing, which summoned Sina in 2019 and ordered it to rectify issues with its products.

description.zh-cn: 新浪旗下的内容平台。2019年曾因传播违法有害信息被暂停更新一个月。
description.en: A content platform under Sina. In 2019, its updates were suspended for one month due to the dissemination of illegal and harmful information.

description.zh-cn: 新浪首席财务官。
description.en: Chief Financial Officer of Sina.

description.zh-cn: 四通利方与华渊资讯合并成立新浪。
description.en: SRSNet merged with Sinanet to form Sina.

description.zh-cn: 华渊资讯与四通利方合并成立新浪。
description.en: Sinanet merged with SRSNet to form Sina.

description.zh-cn: 王志东是新浪的三位创始人之一。
description.en: Wang Zhidong is one of the three co-founders of Sina.

description.zh-cn: 汪延是新浪的三位创始人之一。
description.en: Wang Yan is one of the three co-founders of Sina.

description.zh-cn: 姜丰年是新浪的三位创始人之一。
description.en: Jiang Fengnian is one of the three co-founders of Sina.

description.zh-cn: 王志东与四通集团公司、严援朝共同创办了四通利方。
description.en: Wang Zhidong co-founded SRSNet with Stone Group and Yan Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 四通集团公司与王志东、严援朝共同创办了四通利方。
description.en: Stone Group co-founded SRSNet with Wang Zhidong and Yan Yuanchao.

description.zh-cn: 严援朝与四通集团公司、王志东共同创办了四通利方。
description.en: Yan Yuanchao co-founded SRSNet with Stone Group and Wang Zhidong.

description.zh-cn: 王志东自新浪成立起担任总裁，后兼任CEO，直至2001年被董事会免职。
description.en: Wang Zhidong served as President since Sina's inception, later also as CEO, until he was dismissed by the board in 2001.

description.zh-cn: 新浪董事会投票免去了王志东的CEO及董事职务。
description.en: Sina's board of directors voted to remove Wang Zhidong from his positions as CEO and director.

description.zh-cn: 曹国伟自2006年5月起担任新浪CEO，并于2012年8月起兼任董事长。
description.en: Charles Chao has been the CEO of Sina since May 2006, and also took on the role of Chairman in August 2012.

description.zh-cn: 在王志东被免职后，茅道林接任新浪CEO，直至2003年离职。
description.en: After Wang Zhidong was dismissed, Mao Daolin took over as CEO of Sina until his departure in 2003.

description.zh-cn: 在茅道林离职后，汪延被任命为新浪CEO。
description.en: After Mao Daolin's departure, Wang Yan was appointed CEO of Sina.

description.zh-cn: 新浪于2000年4月13日在纳斯达克上市，成为第一家在美国上市的中国门户网站，后于2021年3月23日完成私有化并退市。
description.en: Sina was listed on NASDAQ on April 13, 2000, becoming the first Chinese portal website to be listed in the United States. It completed its privatization and delisted on March 23, 2021.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国四大门户网站之一，新浪与腾讯在门户业务等领域存在竞争关系。
description.en: As one of China's four major portal websites, Sina competes with Tencent in the portal business and other areas.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国四大门户网站之一，新浪与搜狐在门户业务等领域存在竞争关系。
description.en: As one of China's four major portal websites, Sina competes with Sohu in the portal business and other areas.

description.zh-cn: 作为中国四大门户网站之一，新浪与网易在门户业务等领域存在竞争关系。
description.en: As one of China's four major portal websites, Sina competes with NetEase in the portal business and other areas.

description.zh-cn: 2005年，盛大网络对新浪发起恶意收购，意图控股新浪，但最终失败。
description.en: In 2005, Shanda Interactive launched a hostile takeover bid for Sina, attempting to gain a controlling stake, but ultimately failed.

description.zh-cn: 新浪启动“毒丸计划”以反击盛大网络的恶意收购。
description.en: Sina initiated a 'poison pill' defense to counter the hostile takeover attempt by Shanda Interactive.

description.zh-cn: 新浪向土豆网投资6,640万美元，成为其第五大股东。
description.en: Sina invested US$66.4 million in Tudou, becoming its fifth-largest shareholder.

description.zh-cn: 阿里巴巴集团入股新浪微博18%股份。
description.en: Alibaba Group acquired an 18% stake in Sina Weibo.

description.zh-cn: 新浪于2009年8月推出微博服务“新浪微博”。
description.en: Sina launched its microblogging service, Sina Weibo, in August 2009.

description.zh-cn: 新浪于2005年上线网络日志频道“新浪博客”。
description.en: Sina launched its online blog channel, Sina Blog, in 2005.

description.zh-cn: 新浪博客服务于2022年4月关闭。
description.en: The Sina Blog service was shut down in April 2022.

description.zh-cn: 新浪于2018年3月14日推出消费者投诉平台“黑猫投诉”。
description.en: Sina launched the consumer complaint platform 'Black Cat Complaint' on March 14, 2018.

description.zh-cn: 新浪公司与MSN签署合作协议。
description.en: Sina Corporation signed a cooperation agreement with MSN.

description.zh-cn: 新浪子公司微博公司与阿里巴巴（中国）签署战略合作协议。
description.en: Sina's subsidiary, Weibo Corporation, signed a strategic cooperation agreement with Alibaba (China).

description.zh-cn: 新浪成为NBA的中国官方互联网合作伙伴。
description.en: Sina became the official internet partner of the NBA in China.

description.zh-cn: 新浪与京东签署“京浪计划”战略合作。
description.en: Sina and JD.com signed the 'Jing-Lang Plan' for strategic cooperation.

description.zh-cn: 浙江广电与新浪签署战略合作，在节目宣发、台网互动等方面展开合作。
description.en: Zhejiang Radio & TV Group signed a strategic cooperation with Sina for collaboration in areas such as program promotion and media network interaction.

relationships.target: 2018年中央广播电视总台春节联欢晚会

description.zh-cn: 微博成为2018年央视春晚新媒体社交平台独家合作伙伴。
description.en: Weibo became the exclusive new media social platform partner for the 2018 CCTV Spring Festival Gala.

description.zh-cn: 以CEO曹国伟为首的新浪管理团队通过管理层收购（MBO）成为新浪第一大股东，获得了公司的实际控制权。
description.en: A management team led by CEO Charles Chao became Sina's largest shareholder through a management buyout (MBO), gaining effective control of the company.

relationships.source: 全国“扫黄打非”工作小组办公室

description.zh-cn: 因涉嫌传播淫秽色情信息，全国扫黄打非办通报处罚新浪，拟吊销其《互联网出版许可证》和《信息网络传播视听节目许可证》。
description.en: Due to suspicion of spreading obscene and pornographic information, the National Office Against Pornographic and Illegal Publications announced penalties against Sina, intending to revoke its 'Internet Publishing License' and 'License for Online Transmission of Audio-Visual Programs'.

relationships.source: 国家互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 国家网信办指导北京市网信办因新浪网传播违法有害信息等问题约谈新浪负责人，并责令其全面深入整改。
description.en: The Cyberspace Administration of China directed its Beijing office to summon Sina's负责人 over the dissemination of illegal and harmful information, ordering comprehensive rectification.

relationships.source: 北京市互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 北京市网信办责令新浪对问题突出的“新浪博客”网页版暂停更新1个月。
description.en: The Beijing Cyberspace Administration ordered Sina to suspend updates for the web version of 'Sina Blog' for one month due to prominent issues.

relationships.source: 北京市互联网信息办公室

description.zh-cn: 北京市网信办责令新浪对问题突出的“新浪看点”网页版暂停更新1个月。
description.en: The Beijing Cyberspace Administration ordered Sina to suspend updates for the web version of 'Sina Kandian' for one month due to prominent issues.
